characters.name: Isla
characters.description:
Isla is a Giftia who has a childish appearance, is extremely clumsy, and doesn't show much emotion. She's also a veteran Giftia who is said to be the #1 in retrievals in the terminal service, and she is seen having a diary that records down what she has done with her retrieval targets. 
She is currently working on the same team as [Tsukasa Mizugaki](https://anilist.co/character/88754/Tsukasa-Mizugaki) and has previously worked with [Kazuki Kuwanomi](https://anilist.co/character/88757/Kazuki-Kuwanomi) years ago.

characters.name: Tsukasa Mizugaki
characters.description: After failing his college entrance exams due to medical problems, he eventually gets a job through his father on Terminal Service No. 1, although he initially does not know what they do. He is assigned as [Isla](https://anilist.co/character/88753)'s spotter and soon becomes attached to her.

characters.name: Michiru Kinushima
characters.description:
Michiru Kinushima is a Spotter at Terminal Service #1, and is partnered with Zack. She is Tsukasa Mizugaki's senior and mentor at Terminal Service.

(Source: Plastic Memories Wiki)

characters.name: Zack
characters.description: Zack is a Giftia and a Marksman that is partnered with Michiru Kinushima, and works for the SAI Terminal Service Program. His personality is shown to be a quick-witted character, but also shows many degrees of compassion. Zack is also often portrayed playing quietly on his handheld video games, leading to his appearance of an antisocial character. He is also often portrayed teasing Michiru Kinushima's dialogues.

characters.name: Kazuki Kuwanomi
characters.description:
Kazuki Kuwanomi is the director of field work, a Spotter at Terminal Service #1 and the second in power only to the manager of the department, Takao Yamanobe. She was previously Constance's partner, but recently became Isla's partner again.

(Source: Plastic Memories Wiki)

characters.name: Constance
characters.description:
Constance is a male giftia. He is now Kazuki's partner, ever since Isla and Kazuki disbanded. He is as tall as Tsukasa and though he is a giftia, he looks like he is in his late teens/early 20s. Constance and Tsukasa get along very well, but do not talk much.

(Source: Plastic Memories Wiki)

characters.name: Yasutaka Hanada
characters.description:
Yasutaka Hanada is a veteran employee and spotter at SAI Terminal Service #1. He has been working for over ten years at Terminal Service. He is partnered with Sherry.

(Source: Plastic Memories Wiki)

characters.name: Sherry
characters.description:
Sherry is a Giftia who works at Terminal Service #1 and is Yasutaka Hanada's marksman.

(Source: Plastic Memories Wiki)

characters.name: Eru Miru
characters.description:
Eru Miru is an engineer in the Giftia maintenance team at Terminal Service #1, who has been on the job for two years.

(Source: Plastic Memories Wiki)

characters.name: Takao Yamanobe
characters.description:
Takao Yamanobe is the Section chief for the terminal service 1. Although he is in charge of the small office located behind the SAI tower, he leaves all duties and works to Kazuki Kuwanomi.

(Source: Plastic Memories Wiki)
